docs.snippet: In their first game with the Lakers and coach Mike D'Antoni, MarShon Brooks and Kent Bazemore made sure Los Angeles came out a winner in the latest matchup of the NBA's most storied rivalry....
docs.lead_paragraph: In their first game with the Lakers and coach Mike D'Antoni, MarShon Brooks and Kent Bazemore made sure Los Angeles came out a winner in the latest matchup of the NBA's most storied rivalry.

docs.snippet: The Jamaican bobsled team was the life of the party once again at the Winter Olympics, laughing and joking its way through a trip to Sochi that was fraught with enough financial hardship and travel hijinks to film a sequel to "Cool Runnings."...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jamaican bobsled team was the life of the party once again at the Winter Olympics, laughing and joking its way through a trip to Sochi that was fraught with enough financial hardship and travel hijinks to film a sequel to "Cool Runnings."

headline.main: Jamaican Bobsled Team Faces Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: Jamaican Bobsled Team Faces Uncertain Future

docs.snippet: Nine Connecticut natives competed at the Sochi Games — more representatives than 37 other states — and their performances were closely watched back home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nine Connecticut natives competed at the Sochi Games — more representatives than 37 other states — and their performances were closely watched back home.
docs.abstract: Nine natives of Connecticut competed at the Sochi Games, more representatives than 37 other states, to the delight and pride of fans back home;

headline.main: In Sochi, Connecticut Is a Winner
headline.print_headline: In Sochi, Connecticut Is a Winner
